Params: {3: 'It took you and the others ten minutes to reach Camu.'}
{3: "As soon as Liv is done with Camu's emergency repairs, Camu pulls himself up, trying to go after Roland."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Not that I'm planning to, but if your frame breaks down, Kamui will be goner than gone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "You must know this deep down. Even if you wish to do battle, you must hand Kamui's frame out first.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "...You're just like what the Kurono reports say. Well then, I have a proposal.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Kamui's frame must be sent back with his closed-off M.I.N.D. for a thorough examination. You are placing Kamui at risk every second you stay in his frame.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "At the same time, I know I can't stop you from going after Roland to settle scores, so I have a proposal—You return Kamui's frame, and I'll help you go after Roland in another way.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Through Nikola's connections, we have fortunately found a frame that syncs well with your M.I.N.D. The performance might be slightly sub-par, but your functions will be relatively stable in it—in theory.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "You'll need some extra modifications to use it long-term, but for now, it can still handle around ten days of combat.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "You can't keep fighting with Kamui's frame, so you can have this instead. You go do whatever you want with this frame, while I figure out how to fix Kamui.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Watch out! High energy reaction from above!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'What is Asimov even thinking, firing an airdrop from a railgun?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Specialized pod to withstand the impact. No faster way to get a frame and a surgery cabin delivered in an hour.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'What are you waiting for? I can perform the operation remotely, but you still have to connect to the transfer device yourself.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "I'm a scientist. We don't speak in absolutes.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "But, compared to the Ascendants and Kurono, I think we'd be at least a little more trustworthy... My personal opinion, of course.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu pouts, then pushes the crowd away and stomps toward the surgery pod.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "...I think Kamui told me some stuff about you. Name's Asimov, yeah?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: '"Guy\'s a weirdo. Only ever talks about tech and theory."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: '"Might not be fun guy. But def\' not a bad guy."', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu extracts the connection cable from the pod and points it at the port on his frame.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Sounds too optimistic for me, but I guess I can try believing in him.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: '...Trusting people willy-nilly. Sure gets on my nerves.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu links the connection cable to his data port and sits on the ground, as if asleep.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "I can't promise you Kamui will be ok, but I've never let anyone down before. And I'd like to keep that record.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Move Kamui's body away and open the drop pod door.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Okay. How's it feel having your very own body for once?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Good. The frame is adjusted according to your data in Kurono.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu steps out of the airdrop cabin, moving and stretching his body. He then lifts his greatsword.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Wait! After switching into a new frame, you have to...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Just give up. You can't stop the guy.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Load him into the drop pod and press that blue button. It will return to a transport craft.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "The transport craft is set to return to Babylonia when it receives Kamui's frame. You can now go back to what you were doing.", 4: '1'}
